channel.title: CVE Feed for SourceCodester -- Book Store Management System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SourceCodester -- Book Store Management System

item.title: CVE-2022-3452|2024-08-03T01:07:06.714Z -- sourcecodester -- book%20store%20management%20system
item.description: A vulnerability was found in SourceCodester Book Store Management System 1.0. It has been declared as problematic. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file /category.php. The manipulation of the argument category_name leads to cross site scripting. The attack can be initiated remotely. The identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-210436.

item.title: CVE-2022-3453|2024-08-03T01:07:06.644Z -- sourcecodester -- book%20store%20management%20system
item.description: A vulnerability was found in SourceCodester Book Store Management System 1.0. It has been rated as problematic. This issue affects some unknown processing of the file /transcation.php. The manipulation of the argument buyer_name leads to cross site scripting. The attack may be initiated remotely. The identifier VDB-210437 was assigned to this vulnerability.
